title: Seventh Heaven
description: "SEVENTH HEAVEN confirms her place as one of the finest writers of her generation."NEWSWEEKNora is ahead of her time. A single mother in 1950s suburbia, she's strong, sexy, passionate, and mysterious. Everyone in town is touched by her, and in the mirror of her magnetism, people see themselves as never before. With Nora's courageous image before them, they begin to ask themselves questions they had never asked--finding answers they had never dared to imagine...."Brilliant and astonishing...Suffused with magic."COSMOPOLITAN
author: Alice Hoffman
